title: #92Noon! Bercich/Seifert/Gleeman
description: Pete Bercich and Kevin Seifert both join to share memories and thoughts on Korey Stringer, as it was 20 years ago yesterday that he lost his life to heat exhausted. Some talkers in relation to the Covid situation with the Purple, and Gleeman is in for the final hour with a Russo cameo!
itunes:summary: Pete Bercich and Kevin Seifert both join to share memories and thoughts on Korey Stringer, as it was 20 years ago yesterday that he lost his life to heat exhausted. Some talkers in relation to the Covid situation with the Purple, and Gleeman is in for the final hour with a Russo cameo!
